questions.text: What best describes your current family status?
questions.description: This helps us understand your family dynamics and responsibilities.

options.text: Young professional, no children
Parent with young children (under 18)
Parent with adult children
Business owner with dependents
Retired or near retirement

questions.text: What is your primary estate planning concern?
questions.description: This helps us prioritize what matters most to you.

options.text: Protecting my children's future if something happens to me
Ensuring my business survives without me
Avoiding family conflicts over inheritance
Minimizing tax burden on my estate
Making sure my assets go to the right people
I'm not sure - that's why I'm here

questions.text: What is your current estate planning status?
questions.description: This helps us understand where you are in your planning journey.

options.text: I have nothing in place (0% prepared)
I have a basic will written myself
I have a will drafted by a lawyer
I have a will + some trusts
I have a comprehensive plan (will, trusts, power of attorney)

questions.text: Which emotion best describes how you feel about estate planning?
questions.description: Your emotional state helps us understand your motivation and concerns.

options.text: Terrified - I'm worried my family will struggle financially without me
Frustrated - I keep putting this off
Confused - I don't know where to start
Concerned - I have ex-partners or complex family situations
Motivated - I want the best possible plan for my family

questions.text: How would you describe your asset complexity?
questions.description: This helps us understand the scope of planning needed.

options.text: Simple (savings, EPF, one property)
Moderate (multiple properties, stocks, insurance)
Complex (business ownership, international assets, trusts)

questions.text: What is your timeline for getting estate planning done?
questions.description: This helps us understand your urgency and planning stage.

options.text: Urgent - I need this done ASAP
Soon - Within 3 months
Planning ahead - Within 6-12 months
Just researching - No timeline yet

questions.text: How do you feel about the budget for estate planning?
questions.description: This helps us recommend appropriate solutions for your situation.

options.text: I want the most affordable option
I'll pay for quality, but want to understand costs
Budget is not a concern - I want the best protection
